Date: Friday, 1/31/1992
Subject: Your offer sounds good
I have to admit that I like your offer.
So far, it's the best one I've received.

Regards,
Marvin Monn

Marvin Monn



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1992
Subject: Status of John Loggins
Dear Sir,
John Loggins isn't hitting the ball at all at AA !
He has an AVG of .182, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director
